alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 6:14PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wakefield VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... North Meherrin River near Lunenburg affecting Lunenburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected. * WHERE...North Meherrin River near Lunenburg. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The bridge at Crymes Road, about 2 miles downstream, begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rapidly rise above flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.2 feet on 12/24/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 615 AM EST.
